TopicTitle: Atmosphere disapears in RSS/VE 1.3.1 at 140,000m ( manually installed: no CKAN/RO)

Articles.Content:
There is a problem in RSS 1.3.1:

As soon as I go into space (140,000m) the atmosphere disapears (from light blue to dark blue; clouds are still there). Luckily it apears again at an altidude of 220,000m - 260,000m. Nevertheless it looks awful while flying a rocket.

1.3.1 Mods used:     RSS, RSSVE, scatterer, Kopernicus, PlanetShine, DistantObject, EVE, ModuleManager, Principia [and some part packs]

Is there an outdated mod or is it a normal bug in RSSVE 1.3.1? Thank you for helping in advance! ^.^
